warning.cartRepairedDetails: Some cart issues were detected and fixed

warning.temporaryModeDetails: Cart cannot be saved. Changes will be lost when closing the page.
warning.storageUnavailableDetails: Cart will work in temporary mode
warning.stockInsufficientForMoveDetails: {product} is already in cart with maximum available quantity
